title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.18 - Locker areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.18 - Locker areas

State Regulations

Lockers or other suitable facilities shall be provided
and used for the orderly storage of employee clothing and other belongings. Lockers or other suitable facilities may only be located in the designated
dressing rooms or areas, or in food storage rooms or areas containing only
completely packaged food or packaged single-service articles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-7.18

New

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
